statements: DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE university_name = 'Harvard University';
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE university_name = 'Harvard University' AND status = 'Completed';
DELETE FROM ProjectProgress WHERE project_id = 1 AND progress_status = 'Completed'
DELETE FROM ProjectMembers WHERE member_type = 'Lead' AND project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM ResearchProjects WHERE university_name = 'Harvard University')
DELETE FROM universities WHERE university_name = 'Harvard University';
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 100 AND university_name = 'Example University';
DELETE FROM ProjectMember WHERE university_id = 3 AND role = 'Researcher';
DELETE FROM ProjectMember WHERE project_id = 1 AND university_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Collaboration WHERE university_id1 = 3 AND project_id = 4;
